backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and static brand, appliance, and product data using Maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing required static image files for service cards and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths mapped to short textual summaries of each fileâ€™s purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon, page metadata, and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React UI showing header, service cards with generated image assets, and booking dialog handling.
frontend/src/components/BookServiceDialo: Service booking dialog with form validation, submission via useCreateServiceRequest, and success handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors and refreshes queries on identity changes.
Empty placeholder file intended for a hook mapping appliances to brands.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateServiceReque: React Query mutation hook that submits service requests through the backend actor and invalidates admin queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state using AuthClient, including loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch appliances, brands, and brands by appliance using an actor from canister backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including light/dark mode color tokens and global background/foreground settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Adds type definitions for Vite environment variables used in the project.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom colors, radius, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, deployed version info, feature requirements, and needed image assets for the site.
